item.title: Adaptive DDoS Protection
item.description: Adaptive DDoS ProtectionAdaptive DDoS Protection learns your unique traffic patterns and adapts to them to provide better protection against sophisticated DDoS attacks on layer 7 and layers 3/4, depending on your subscribed Cloudflare services. Adaptive DDoS Protection provides the following types of protection: Origin-aware DDoS Protection: Detects and mitigates traffic that deviates from your site’s origin errors profile. User-agent-aware DDoS Protection: Detects and mitigates traffic that deviates from the top User Agents seen by Cloudflare on the network.
